comment: FrenchTrainDetectionSystemLimitation + mapped from ERA ontology by Smart Data Models adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ERA/master/FrenchTrainDetectionSystemLimitation/schema.json
description:
Specific for route compatibility check on French network. Sections with: 
-1 Tonnage circulated per track is inferior to 15000 tons/day/track 
-2 Directional Interlocking 
-3 45-second delay for directional interlocking 
-4 Installation with track circuit announcement 
-5 Absence of a shunting assistance pedal in the normal direction of circulation for non-reversible double track lines 
-6 Absence of a shunting assistance pedal regardless of the direction of traffic for single track lines and tracks for two

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: frenchTrainDetectionSystemLimitationApplicable
contents.comment: Section with train detection limitation is applicable, only for the French network

contents.name: frenchTrainDetectionSystemLimitationNumber
contents.comment: Section with train detection limitation number, only for French  network

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)
